Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Cormag:
Aloof Lanceman with Anna: Commander on
your team.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Cormag:
Aloof Lanceman on Lunatic or higher difficulty
with Cormag: Aloof Lanceman on your team.

Defeat Cormag: Aloof Lanceman at level 40
or higher with Anna: Commander.

Defeat Cormag: Aloof Lanceman at level 40 or
higher with Cormag: Aloof Lanceman.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Cormag:
Aloof Lanceman on Lunatic or higher using
an all-infantry team.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Fae
& Idunn with Alfonse: Prince of Askr on
your team.

& Idunn on Lunatic or higher with Sharena:
Princess of Askr on your team.

Defeat Fae: Divine Dragon at level 40
or higher with Alfonse: Prince of Askr.

Defeat Idunn: Dark Priestess at level 40 or
higher with Sharena: Princess of Askr.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Fae
& Idunn on Lunatic or higher difficulty using
an all-amored team.

Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.

Clear Paralogue 48: Part 1 on Lunatic difficulty
with a lance ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 48: Part 2 on Lunatic difficulty
with an axe ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 48: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team.
(Allies deployed as cohorts using Pair Up
do not count.) All four allies must survive.
Defeat a sword foe with a sword ally.
Defeat a lance foe with a sword ally.
Defeat an axe foe with a sword ally.
Defeat a colorless bow foe with a sword ally.
Defeat a colorless dagger foe with a sword ally.
Defeat a staff foe with a sword ally.

Defeat a sword foe that is level 30 or higher
with a sword ally.

Defeat a lance foe that is level 30 or higher
with a sword ally.

Defeat an axe foe that is level 30 or higher
with a sword ally.

Defeat a colorless bow foe that is level 30 or
higher with a sword ally.

Defeat a staff foe that is level 30 or higher

Byleth, a professor at the Church of Seiros's
Officers Academy, and Rhea, the church's
archbishop, enjoying a summer away. They
appear in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

The only member of common birth in the entire
Black Eagle House. Her beautiful voice, honed
over years, can harmonize with even crashing
waves. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Daughter of House Galatea of the Holy Kingdom
of Faerghus. Her summer outfit does nothing to
dull her trademark diligence in any way. Appears
in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Heir to the title of Margrave Gautier. Excited by
the opportunity to show off in front of the ladies
spending summer on the beach. Appears in Fire
Emblem: Three Houses.

Heir to the famously noble House Gloucester.
Determined to conduct himself as his status
demands, even on the beach. Appears in Fire
Emblem: Three Houses.

(Duo Skills can be used by tapping the Duo
button. Duo Skills cannot be used by units
deployed using Pair Up.)

Standard Effect 1: Duel
If unit is 5★ and level 40 and unit's stats total
less than 185, treats unit's stats as 185 in
modes like Arena. (Higher-scoring opponents
will appear. Stat total calculation excludes any
values added by merges and skills.)

Duo Skill can be used multiple times,
and grants Desperation! Can also
neutralize follow-up-blocking effects.

If she takes part in the first combat
within a phase, her stats increase
and she recovers HP!

Grants Def+3. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4
during combat. After combat, if unit attacked,
deals 4 damage to unit.

If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, grants Atk/Def/Res+5 to unit
during combat.

At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Spd-7 on foes
within 2 spaces through their next actions.
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Atk/Spd-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces
of target through their next actions. If foe's
Range = 2, calculates damage using the lower
of foe's Def or Res.

If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP = 100% at
start of combat, grants Atk/Def+5 to unit
during combat and inflicts Special cooldown
charge -1 on foe per attack. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

If foe initiates combat or if unit's HP < 100% at
start of combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to
unit during combat, and if unit deals damage
to foe during combat, restores 7 HP to unit.
(Triggers even if 0 damage is dealt.)

Grants Spd+3. During unit's first combat
in player phase or enemy phase, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 to unit and restores
10 HP to unit after combat.

$aDuring unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Effect:【Dagger ５】

【Dagger ５】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-５ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

$aDuring unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

Effect:【Dagger ７】

【Dagger ７】
After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts
Def/Res-７ on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.

Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of combat, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd or
if foe's HP = 100%, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit
during combat and neutralizes effects that
guarantee foe's follow-up attacks and effects
that prevent unit's follow-up attacks.

During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

During unit's first combat in player phase or
enemy phase, grants Atk/Res+5 to unit and
restores 7 HP to unit after combat.

At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-3 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total
through its next action.

At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-5 on foe on
the enemy team with the highest Spd+Res total
through its next action.

During unit's first combat in enemy phase,
if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 30%.

During unit's first combat in enemy phase,
if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 40%.

During unit's first combat in enemy phase,
if foe initiates combat, reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 50%.

If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-3 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-5 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

If Sing or Dance is used, inflicts Atk-7 on
nearest foes within 4 spaces of unit through
their next actions.

$aGrants【Desperation】to unit and allies within
2 spaces.

At start of every third turn, if Duo Skill has
already been used, unit can use Duo Skill again.

【Desperation】
Grants the following effect for 1 turn: "If unit
initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up
attack before foe can counterattack."

Grannvale was a kingdom comprised
of six duchies bound together by the
throne in its capital, Belhalla. It was at
Belhalla's academy that Sigurd, Quan,
and Eldigan first met and studied
together, creating a lasting friendship
between three sons of distinguished
families from around the continent.
They swore on their bond that they
would always rush to aid one another
if ever trouble came to any of them...
